verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H7971>"Send<s%> out for yourself <S%H376>men<s%> so that they may <S%H8446>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am going to <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> you shall <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> from <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H259><s%> of their fathers' <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3605>one<s%> a <S%H5387>leader<s%> among them."

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran<s%> at the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H376>men<s%> who were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> then [were] their <S%H8034>names:<s%> from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H8051>Shammua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2139>Zaccur;<s%>
from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2752>Hori;<s%>
from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh;<s%>
from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H3008>Igal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph;<s%>
from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun;<s%>
from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H6406>Palti<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7505>Raphu;<s%>
from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H1427>Gaddiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5476>Sodi;<s%>
from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H1426>Gaddi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5485>Susi;<s%>
from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H5988>Ammiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1582>Gemalli;<s%>
from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H5639>Sethur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael;<s%>
from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H5147>Nahbi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2058>Vophsi;<s%>
from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H1345>Geuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4352>Machi.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8446>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land;<s%> but <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%>

When <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them to <S%H8446>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H5927>"Go<s%> up <S%H2088>there<s%> into the <S%H5045>Negev;<s%> then <S%H5927>go<s%> up into the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country.<s%>

"And <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is like, and whether the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3427>live<s%> in it are <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H518>[or<s%>] <S%H7504>weak,<s%> whether they are <S%H4592>few<s%> or <S%H7227>many.<s%>

"And <S%H4100>how<s%> is the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H3427>live,<s%> is it <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad<s%>? And <S%H4100>how<s%> are the <S%H5892>cities<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1992><s%> they <S%H3427>live,<s%> are [they] like [open] <S%H4264>camps<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> with <S%H4013>fortifications<s%>?

"And <S%H4100>how<s%> is the <S%H776>land,<s%> is it <S%H8082>fat<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H7330>lean<s%>? Are <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> in it <S%H518>or<s%> not? <S%H2388>Make<s%> an <S%H2388>effort<s%> then to <S%H3947>get<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>" Now the <S%H3117>time<s%> was the <S%H3117>time<s%> of the <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>ripe<s%> <S%H6025>grapes.<s%>
So they <S%H5927>went<s%> up and <S%H8446>spied<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H7340>Rehob,<s%> at Lebo-hamath.

When they had <S%H5927>gone<s%> up into the <S%H5045>Negev,<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> <S%H289>Ahiman,<s%> <S%H8344>Sheshai<s%> and <S%H8526>Talmai,<s%> the <S%H3211>descendants<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%> were. (Now <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> was <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6814>Zoan<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>)

Then they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol<s%> and from <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>down<s%> a <S%H2156>branch<s%> with a <S%H259>single<s%> <S%H811>cluster<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes;<s%> and they <S%H5375>carried<s%> it on a <S%H4132>pole<s%> between <S%H8147>two<s%> [men,] with <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> and the <S%H8384>figs.<s%>

That <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H182><s%> of the <S%H811>cluster<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>down<s%> from <S%H8033>there.<s%>
When they <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H8446>spying<s%> out the <S%H776>land,<s%> at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%>

they <S%H1980>proceeded<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran,<s%> at <S%H6946>Kadesh;<s%> and they <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to them and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and <S%H7200>showed<s%> them the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Thus they <S%H5608>told<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> "We <S%H935>went<s%> in to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you <S%H7971>sent<s%> us; and it <S%H1571>certainly<s%> does <S%H2100>flow<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is its <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

<S%H657>"Nevertheless,<s%> <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> are <S%H5794>strong,<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H1219>fortified<s%> [and] <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>large;<s%> and <S%H1571>moreover,<s%> we <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H3211>descendants<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

<S%H6002>"Amalek<s%> is <S%H3427>living<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5045>Negev<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> are <S%H3427>living<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country,<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> are <S%H3427>living<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and by the <S%H3027>side<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>"

Then <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H2013>quieted<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "We should by <S%H5927>all<s%> <S%H5927>means<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up and <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of it, for we shall <S%H3201>surely<s%> <S%H3201>overcome<s%> it."

But the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had <S%H5927>gone<s%> up with him <S%H559>said,<s%> "We are not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> for they are <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H2389>strong<s%> for us."

So they <S%H3318>gave<s%> out to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H1681>bad<s%> <S%H1681>report<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H8446>spied<s%> out, <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we have <S%H5674>gone,<s%> in <S%H8446>spying<s%> it out, is a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H398>devours<s%> its <S%H3427>inhabitants;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> we <S%H7200>saw<s%> in it are <S%H376>men<s%> of [great] <S%H4060>size.<s%>

<S%H8033>"There<s%> also we <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5303>Nephilim<s%> (the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%> are part of the <S%H5303>Nephilim<s%>); and we <S%H1961>became<s%> like <S%H2284>grasshoppers<s%> in our own <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> we were in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>"
